name: Twisted Space: Volume 1
description:
Twisted Space is a fan-made friendsim series starring the glitch-trolls cast, planned to be multiple volumes!

In this free-to-play game, you play as a dazed newcomer to Alternia who doesn’t seem very.... troll-like, to say the least. As you make your way through the winding streets of Alternia and dodge the searching spotlights of overhead drones, you might come along some more friendly faces along the way...

WARNING: This game contains horror elements, mild gore (though no on-screen violence) that may be upsetting to viewers, so please be careful if you're sensitive to such things! Thank you!
